type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be CrowdFlowObserved

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refRoadSegment.description: Relationship. Concerned road segment on which the observation has been made. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'.

dateObserved.description: Property. The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTC format. It can be represented by an specific time instant or by an ISO8601 interval. As a workaround for the lack of support of Orion Context Broker for datetime intervals, it can be used two separate attributes: `dateObservedFrom`, `dateObservedTo`. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'.

dateObservedFrom.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Observation period start date and time. See `dateObserved`.

dateObservedTo.description: Property. Observation period end date and time. See `dateObserved`.. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'.

peopleCount.description: Property. Total number of people detected during this observation.

occupancy.description: Property. Fraction of the observation time where a person has been occupying the observed walkway. Model:'https://schema.org/Number)'

averageCrowdSpeed.description: Property. Average speed of the crowd transiting during the observation period. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Kilometer per hour (Km/h).'

congested.description: Property. Flags whether there was a crowd congestion during the observation period in the referred walkway. The absence of this attribute means no crowd congestion. Model:'https://schema.org/Boolean'.

averageHeadwayTime.description:
Property. Average headway time. Headway time is the time
    elapsed between two consecutive persons. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'second (s)'

direction.description: Property. Usual direction of travel in the walkway referred by this observation with respect to the city center. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Enum:'inbound, outbound'
